SRP.Q: In 2002, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing AquaFlow Utilities relative to TerraGen Power?
SRP.A: In 2002, AquaFlow Utilities is {above} TerraGen Power in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On TerraGen Power, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1979 relative to that in 1978 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On TerraGen Power, the data point in 1979 is {above} and to the {right} of the data point in 1978.
